# Data Visualisation

In this part of the course, we will dive deep into data visualisation. We will start using base **R** and then explore the package **ggplot2**, [@R-ggplot2].

## Base **R**

```{r eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
learnr::run_tutorial(name = "02-data-visualisation-graphics",
                     package = "moxier")
```

## **ggplot2**

```{r eval = FALSE, echo = TRUE}
learnr::run_tutorial(name = "03-data-visualisation-ggplot2",
                     package = "moxier")
```
